metadata.title: My Wildiary App
metadata.description: The app is designed for team-based recording and sharing of nature observations. Users can log field data, enrich it with photos and descriptions, and view everything on an interactive map.
metadata.openGraph-description: The app is designed for team-based recording and sharing of nature observations. Users can log field data, enrich it with photos and descriptions, and view everything on an interactive map.
metadata.openGraph-alt: Preview of the app for recording observations in nature.
metadata.twitter-title: Preview of the app for recording nature observations.
metadata.twitter-description: Preview of the app for recording nature observations.
